summary: The Recharge class encapsulates the configuration of recharge boundary conditions for MODFLOW-6 groundwater flow models, allowing users to define spatially distributed recharge flux rates, optional solute concentrations for coupled transport simulations, and various output and budgeting options. It supports temporal repetition of stress data, handling of inactive cells, and optional validation of input parameters.
business_intent: To enable modelers to accurately represent surface water infiltration into groundwater systems within MODFLOW-6 simulations, providing flexible specification of recharge rates, transport properties, and reporting controls while ensuring input consistency.
